DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective multicenter , prospective , single arm clinical trial evaluate safety effectiveness Angel速 Catheter subject high risk PE , recognize contraindication standard pharmacological therapy ( anticoagulation ) .
DOC.brief_title: The Angel速 Catheter Pivotal Clinical Trial
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject legally authorized representative willing able provide write informed consent , 2 . Subject 18 year old , 3 . Subject expect remain critical care set least 72 hour , AND least one follow inclusion criterion ( 4,5 , and/or 6 ) 4 . Subject recognize contraindication standard pharmacological thromboprophylaxis include : Active bleeding high risk bleeding OR Hypersensitivity pharmacological thromboprophylaxis OR History severe heparin induce thrombocytopenia OR Severe thrombocytopenia 5 . Subject confirm acute proximal low extremity DVT confirm acute PE recognize contraindication anticoagulation 6 . Subject require temporary interruption ( > 24 hour ) pharmacological thromboprophylaxis surgical medical procedure 1 . Subject pregnant 2 . Subject treatment investigational drug device within 30 day prior enrollment 3 . Subject preexist IVC filter place 4 . BMI = > 45 5 . Subject function pelvic renal allograft side available device insertion 6 . Subject undergone surgical procedure involve femoral vein pelvic vein device must insert 7 . Anatomic inability place Angel速 Catheter 8 . Subject know hypersensitivity component Angel速 Catheter , specifically Nitinol ( nickel and/or titanium )
